text: How to make sure a user can only vote once on an ASP.NET poll
I'm trying to make a ASP.NET (C#) poll that will ask a user a Yes/No question and log that vote to the database.
To prevent spam I would like to be able to make sure users can only vote once.
I've thought about logging the users IP address.
If this is the answer can someone give me a tutorial that shows how this can be accomplished.
If this is not the answer then give me your suggestions.
Edit: I'm not asking users to register as this is not my website.
